org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class Drivetrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.Mechanism
      • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.Drivetrain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PIDloops

    public class Drivetrain
extends Mechanism
    This class declares the drivetrain mechanism and sends data from the controller to the robot and uses that data to set the motor powers

      • actuallyMoveToPosition

        public void actuallyMoveToPosition(Location goalPos,
                                   double xTolerance,
                                   double zTolerance,
                                   double rotTolerance,
                                   int maxTime)
        Moves to robot to goalPos in maxTime
        Parameters:
        goalPos - the final position of the robot
        xTolerance - the tolerance for the x coordinate
        zTolerance - the tolerance for the z coordinate
        rotTolerance - tolerance for the rotation
        maxTime - maximum amount of time that the robot can take

        Returns:
        the distance from the goalPos

      • rotationError

        public float rotationError(float goal,
                           float current)
        Calculates the error for the rotation
        Parameters:

        current - where we are
        Returns:
